import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Information() { const [ShowProPass, setShowProPass] = useState(false); const [ShowReProPass, setShowReProPass] = useState(false); function NewPasswordToggler() { setShowProPass(!ShowNewPass); } function RePasswordToggler() { setShowReProPass(!ShowRePass); } return (
